General.Name: Lautan Luas Tbk
General.Description: PT Lautan Luas Tbk engages in the manufacture and distribution of basic and specialty chemicals for industrial end-users primarily in Indonesia and the Asia-Pacific region. The company operates through three segments: Distribution, Manufacturing, and Services. It offers sulfuric acid, aluminum sulfate, sodium silicate, potash alum, poly aluminum chloride, glocose, aluminum chlorohydrate, white oil, vaslina, wax, master batch white and additive, PVC stabilizer and compound additives, sodium metabisulphite and sodium bisulphite, blowing agent, fertilizer, and chemical processing for footwear/rubber, paper, water treatment, oilfield and mining, and textile, as well as non-dairy creamer and dairy creamer products. The company also provides laboratory services and solutions for customers in electroplating, leather, paper, textile, and water treatment industries; and supply chain and information technology solutions comprising HR solutions, as well as water treatment solutions through WATERCARE and PUREVE. In addition, it offers integrated logistics services comprising contract and outsourcing logistics, warehouse package and bulk services, bulk product management, stevedoring, cold chain, cold and liquid storage, kitting and co-packaging, freight forwarding, export import expedition, customs brokerage, 3P logistics, and e-fulfilment, as well as cargo, domestics distribution, and transportation services. It serves the food and beverages, animal feed, personal and household care, automotive, drinking and waste water, building construction, agriculture, mining, textile and apparel, as well as pulp, paper, and packaging industries. The company was formerly known as Perusahaan Andil Maskapai Dagang dan Industri Lim Teck Lee and changed its name to PT Lautan Luas Tbk in 1965. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Lautan Luas Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Caturkarsa Megatunggal.
